n = int(input())
print(n - 1 if sum(map(int, input().split())) % n else n)

n = int(input())
arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
sum = 0
for x in arr:
	sum += x
result = n-1
if sum%n == 0:
	result = n
print(result)

import sys
import math
  
n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
an = [int(x) for x in (sys.stdin.readline()).split()]

vsum = sum(an)
if(vsum % n == 0):
    print(int(n))
else:
    print(int(n - 1))

n = int(input())
print(n - (sum(map(int, input().split())) % n != 0))

n = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
a.sort()
if sum(a) % n == 0:
	print(n)
else:
	print(n - 1)

n=int(input())
a=list(map(int,input().split()))
sum=0
for i in range(n):
    sum+=a[i]
print(n if sum%n==0 else n-1)

n=input()
mas=input()
mas=mas.split(' ',int(len(mas)+1/2))
mas = list(map(int, mas))
k=sum(mas)/len(mas)
if (k%1==0):
    print(len(mas))
else:
    print(len(mas)-1)
